channel.title: [PI]Prevent Starter from Being Traded
channel.description: Anyone of doing this for Project Insanity?

item.title: [PI]Prevent Starter from Being Traded
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“sageofmali, post:6, topic:401813”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=498872.msg3648235#msg3648235 date=1309542245]

Anyone of doing this for Project Insanity?

What exactly is the “starter”?

A player that logged in for the first time. If he didn’t play more then an hour or more he is a starter.

I know that, I mean what are the contents of the “Starter package”. I know most servers do crazy things like 500k, party hats, armor, etc.

The reason people didn’t abuse the start in RuneScape is because people had to go through Tutorial Island to get to the real content.
[/quote]
Already got it, I made a timer to wait 30 minutes. Hmm, I should make a tutorial island… Sounds like fun![/quote]

It would prevent people from wanting to trade starters (well maybe not. Since your starter package is probably very large and valuable, people might take the time). The reason people didn’t in RuneScape is because they got 25 gp, a few runes, and some tools.

Read full topic

The reason people didn’t abuse the start in RuneScape is because people had to go through Tutorial Island to get to the real content.[/quote]
Already got it, I made a timer to wait 30 minutes. Hmm, I should make a tutorial island… Sounds like fun!

@halflive9 wrote:

sageofmali:

Anyone of doing this for Project Insanity?

add something like

then make it that it takes every minute 1 off.
